trans-unit.source: Represents a lightweight object that is useful for tree insert operations.
trans-unit.target: Representa um objeto simples que é útil para operações de inserção de árvore.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocumentFragment"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocumentFragment"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Do not instantiate an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocumentFragment> directly; instead, use methods such as <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CreateDocumentFragment%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Não instanciar um <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocumentFragment>diretamente; em vez disso, utilize métodos, tais como <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CreateDocumentFragment%2A>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CreateDocumentFragment%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocumentFragment>

trans-unit.source: The XML document that is the source of the fragment.
trans-unit.target: O documento XML que é a origem do fragmento.

trans-unit.source: Creates a duplicate of this node.
trans-unit.target: Cria um duplicado deste nó.

trans-unit.source: `CloneNode` serves as a copy constructor for nodes.
trans-unit.target: `CloneNode`funciona como um construtor de cópia para nós.

trans-unit.source: To see how this method behaves with other node types, see <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.CloneNode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para ver como este método se comporta com outros tipos de nó, consulte <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.CloneNode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.CloneNode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The cloned node has no parent (<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocumentFragment.ParentNode%2A> returns `null`).
trans-unit.target: O nó clonado não tem um principal (<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocumentFragment.ParentNode%2A> devolve `null`).</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocumentFragment.ParentNode%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to recursively clone the subtree under the specified node; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to clone only the node itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para recursivamente clonar subárvore sob o nó especificado; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para clonar apenas o próprio nó.

trans-unit.source: The cloned node.
trans-unit.target: O nó clonado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the markup representing the children of this node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a marcação que representa o subordinado deste nó.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property replaces the children of the node with the parsed contents of the given string.
trans-unit.target: Definir esta propriedade substitui os subordinados do nó com o conteúdo analisar a cadeia especificada.

trans-unit.source: The parsing is done in the current namespace context.
trans-unit.target: A análise é efetuada no contexto atual do espaço de nomes.

trans-unit.source: This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é uma extensão da Microsoft para o documento Object Model (DOM).

trans-unit.source: The markup of the children of this node.
trans-unit.target: A marcação do subordinado deste nó.

trans-unit.source: The XML specified when setting this property is not well-formed.
trans-unit.target: O XML especificado quando a definição desta propriedade não está corretamente formado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the local name of the node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do local do nó.

trans-unit.source: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlDocumentFragment" name="XmlDocumentFragment" href=""></xref> nodes, the local name is <xref uid="langword_csharp_#document-fragment" name="#document-fragment" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlDocumentFragment" name="XmlDocumentFragment" href=""> </xref> nós, o nome local é <xref uid="langword_csharp_#document-fragment" name="#document-fragment" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the qualified name of the node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome qualificado do nó.

trans-unit.source: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlDocumentFragment" name="XmlDocumentFragment" href=""></xref>, the name is <xref uid="langword_csharp_#document-fragment" name="#document-fragment" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlDocumentFragment" name="XmlDocumentFragment" href=""></xref>, the name is <xref uid="langword_csharp_#document-fragment" name="#document-fragment" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de nó atual.

trans-unit.source: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlDocumentFragment" name="XmlDocumentFragment" href=""></xref> nodes, this value is XmlNodeType.DocumentFragment.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlDocumentFragment" name="XmlDocumentFragment" href=""> </xref> nós, este valor é XmlNodeType.DocumentFragment.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"></xref> to which this node belongs.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"> </xref> a que pertence este nó.

trans-unit.source: When adding nodes to the current node, use the `XmlDocument` returned by the `OwnerDocument` property to create the node.
trans-unit.target: Ao adicionar nós para o nó atual, utilize o `XmlDocument` devolvido pelo `OwnerDocument` propriedade para criar o nó.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlDocument" name="XmlDocument" href=""></xref> to which this node belongs.
trans-unit.target: O <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlDocument" name="XmlDocument" href=""> </xref> a que pertence este nó.

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent of this node (for nodes that can have parents).
trans-unit.target: Obtém o principal deste nó (para nós podem ter elementos principais).

trans-unit.source: The parent of this node.
trans-unit.target: O elemento principal deste nó.

trans-unit.source: For <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlDocumentFragment" name="XmlDocumentFragment" href=""></xref> nodes, this property is always <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlDocumentFragment" name="XmlDocumentFragment" href=""> </xref> nós, esta propriedade é sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Saves all the children of the node to the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Guarda todos os elementos subordinados do nó especificado <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: Este método é uma extensão da Microsoft para o documento Object Model (DOM).

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""></xref> to which you want to save.
trans-unit.target: O <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""> </xref> ao qual pretende guardar.

trans-unit.source: Saves the node to the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Guarda o nó especificado <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: Este método é uma extensão da Microsoft para o documento Object Model (DOM).

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""></xref> to which you want to save.
trans-unit.target: O <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlWriter" name="XmlWriter" href=""> </xref> ao qual pretende guardar.
